title: FDK-errors help, what must i do
content:
When i try to compile i get this: (fdk)

mac-mini-van-doeke-wartena-2:Capt doekewartena$ makeotf

makeotf [Note] setting the DONT\_USE\_WIN\_LINE\_METRICS OS/2 fsSelection bit 7 from fontinfo keyword.  
makeotf [Note] setting the WEIGHT\_WIDTH\_SLOPE\_ONLY OS/2 fsSelection bit 8 from fontinfo keyword.  
makeotf [Note] setting the OBLIQUE OS/2 fsSelection bit 9 from fontinfo keyword.  
/Users/doekewartena/bin/FDK/Tools/osx/../SharedData/FDKScripts/MakeOTF.py:794: UnicodeWarning: Unicode equal comparison failed to convert both arguments to Unicode - interpreting them as being unequal  
 while parts1[i] == parts2[i]:  
/Users/doekewartena/bin/FDK/Tools/osx/../SharedData/FDKScripts/MakeOTF.py:804: UnicodeWarning: Unicode equal comparison failed to convert both arguments to Unicode - interpreting them as being unequal  
 if absPath1 == abspath2:  
makeotf [Note] Writing options file ./current.fpr  
Traceback (most recent call last):  
 File "/Users/doekewartena/bin/FDK/Tools/osx/../SharedData/FDKScripts/MakeOTF.py", line 2249, in  
 main()  
 File "/Users/doekewartena/bin/FDK/Tools/osx/../SharedData/FDKScripts/MakeOTF.py", line 2243, in main  
 saveOptionsFile(makeOTFParams) # this always saves options to kDefaultOptionsFile; may also save to user-specified option file.  
 File "/Users/doekewartena/bin/FDK/Tools/osx/../SharedData/FDKScripts/MakeOTF.py", line 681, in saveOptionsFile  
 writeOptionsFile(makeOTFParams, filePath)  
 File "/Users/doekewartena/bin/FDK/Tools/osx/../SharedData/FDKScripts/MakeOTF.py", line 674, in writeOptionsFile  
 fp.write(data)  
UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character u'\u0308' in position 62: ordinal not in range(128)  
mac-mini-van-doeke-wartena-2:Capt doekewartena$
author: clankill3r
